description: The classic&nbsp;Bee's Knees Cocktail and the AT-AT Knees have a little common origin. The cocktail is named for its cool&nbsp;gin, lemon, and honey mixture. Named after the AT-AT walker, a Star Wars 4-legged combat vehicle, this drink is robust and strongâ€”their only difference is that the AT-AT Knees cocktail is flavorful and delicious!
name: AT-AT Knees

recipeInstructions.name: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Shake well until combined and chilled.
